name: Losing my religions..... non-biblical SNUFF FILM from the Middle Ages
reviewBody:
Losing my religions..... non-biblical SNUFF FILM from the Middle Ages.....

This is NOT the crucifixion of The Bible. 

It is a passion play. 

Passion plays ultimately were used to incite anti-Semitism.

"Jésus de Montréal" is a far better and far more Christian film.

It is highly hypocritical that the same groups that complain of violence in films, now hold this SNUFF FILM up for praise.

Mel Gibson really is a crazy anti-Semite.

I hear
